name: stockforumx
description: Real-time stock discussion and prediction platform with accuracy-based reputation

scripts.dev:services: concurrently "cd services/price-updater && go run main.go" "cd services/alert-engine && go run main.go" "cd services/analytics-service && go run main.go" "cd services/sentiment-service && go run main.go" "cd services/oracle-service && go run main.go"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:services"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=client && npm install --workspace=server
